ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure
Class TextTile

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.Tile
      ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.TextTile

public class TextTile
extends Tile

A text Tile for use in stories. TextTile is a concrete implementation of the abstract class Tile. TextTile is a member of this application's model, it is included in the JSON when the story is serialized and stored via the use of the handlers. A TextTile will contain an image to be displayed in the story.
